column83: A repeat customer called seeking immediate logistical support regarding the fitment of a previously viewed orthopedic mattress into her custom bed frame. This successful resolution immediately secured a confirmed store visit.
column84: The agent performed very well, demonstrating high commitment to customer service by resolving a critical logistical barrier. His willingness to engage with the carpenter was key to moving the customer from the 'Desire' stage to the 'Action' stage. The call was successfully converted into a confirmed store visit, despite the agent not being physically present at the store.
